locations.name: Inventor's Workshop
locations.description: A large chamber filled with workbenches, strange tools, and half-finished inventions. The air feels thick with tension and the scent of oil and burnt metal. Dimly lit by flickering lanterns, eerie shadows dance across the cluttered workbenches. The adventurers have recently encountered a malfunctioning automaton, confirming suspicions of a deeper mystery involving the gnome kings' disappearance.

npcs.name: Fibblestib
npcs.description: Head inventor, an elderly gnome with wild hair and spectacles.

npcs.name: Gnome Greeter
npcs.description: A gnome who was dragged into the workshop by Norn, now nursing a bruised cheek.

locations.weatherConditions: Controlled by gnomish devices, slight ozone smell
plotHooks: Discover a device to help against Cryovain
Find clues about the missing gnome kings
Investigate the malfunctioning machine linked to the kings' disappearance
Explore Testing Chamber and Living Quarters as indicated by the blueprints
Uncover the secrets hidden in the journal found in the workshop

traps.name: Shocking Floor Plates
traps.description: Hidden floor plates that discharge electricity when stepped on.

features.name: Workbenches
features.description: Several sturdy wooden benches covered in tools and gadgets.

features.name: Arcane Apparatus
features.description: A large, complex machine with spinning gears and glowing runes.

features.name: Mechanical Spider
features.description: A peculiar contraption resembling a mechanical spider, its legs twitching as if attempting to come to life.

dcChecks.description: Notice the blueprints for a dragon-repelling device among the clutter
Understand the function of the complex arcane apparatus

doors.name: Workshop to Welcome Chamber Door
doors.description: A sturdy wooden door with intricate gears and mechanisms.

doors.name: Workshop to Testing Chamber Door
doors.description: A reinforced metal door with magical runes etched into its surface.

locations.name: Welcome Chamber
locations.description: The 'Welcome Chamber' is a grand room with high ceilings adorned with ornate carvings and tapestries depicting gnome history. The room is illuminated by soft, glowing crystals embedded in the walls, casting an ethereal light across the chamber. Several pedestals and alcoves house relics and artifacts of apparent importance. The air is filled with a sense of ancient significance.

npcs.name: Bimble
npcs.description: A cheerful gnome greeter who welcomes visitors to Gnomengarde.

resourcesAvailable: Record of the chamber's ancient history
plotHooks: Discover the hidden mechanism to open a concealed passageway
Uncover the history of the chamber's ancient guardians
Investigate the disappearance of Kings Korboz and Gnerkli

features.name: Stone Pedestal
features.description: A large, intricately carved stone pedestal in the center of the room, holding an old, dust-covered tome bound in cracked leather.

features.name: Circular Table
features.description: A large, circular table in the center of the room, displaying several maps and scrolls detailing the layout of Gnomengarde.

features.name: Fountain
features.description: A small fountain in the corner of the room, bubbling with a faintly glowing liquid.

features.name: Hidden Lever
features.description: A hidden lever behind one of the tapestries, revealed by Gilly.

dcChecks.description: Detect the hidden mechanism that opens the concealed passageway.

doors.name: Welcome Chamber to Hidden Entrance Door
doors.description: A cleverly disguised door that blends seamlessly with the surrounding rock and is an exit out. If the player came in this way they would know about it.

doors.name: Welcome Chamber to Inventor's Workshop Door
doors.description: A wooden door with gears and cogs decorating its surface.

doors.name: Welcome Chamber to Living Quarters Door
doors.description: A simple wooden door with a 'Home Sweet Home' sign.

doors.name: Welcome Chamber to Concealed Passageway Door
doors.description: A hidden door revealed by pulling a lever behind one of the tapestries, leading further into Gnomengarde.

locations.name: Hidden Entrance
locations.description: Upon entering the Hidden Entrance, the adventurers found themselves in a dimly lit, narrow passageway carved into the rock. The air was cool and damp, with the faint sound of dripping water echoing through the corridor. The walls were lined with ancient, faded carvings depicting scenes of battles long past. The atmosphere thick with ancient mystery and the promise of deeper secrets within Gnomengarde.
locations.accessibility: Hidden, requires perception and investigation checks
plotHooks: Discover the secret of Gnomengarde's location
Uncover the fate of the missing gnome kings
lootTable: Tattered journal with cryptic notes and sketches

traps.name: Hidden Pressure Plate
traps.description: A trap that causes the stairway to collapse if triggered.

features.name: Illusory Wall
features.description: A magical illusion concealing the entrance

features.name: Hidden Mechanism
features.description: A small, almost imperceptible indentation in the rock that, when pressed, opens the hidden door.

features.name: Faded Murals
features.description: Ancient murals depicting a long-forgotten civilization.

features.name: Stone Pedestal
features.description: A pedestal in the center of the room with an ornate, dust-covered chest.

features.name: Revealed Passageway
features.description: A passageway deeper into Gnomengarde, revealed by triggering a hidden mechanism.

dcChecks.description: Find the mechanism to open the hidden door.
Check the ornate chest for additional traps.

doors.name: Hidden Entrance Door
doors.description: A door seamlessly blended into the cliff face, protected by illusion magic.

locations.name: Living Quarters
locations.description: A series of small, cozy rooms where the gnomes rest and relax, filled with the smell of cooking and the gentle hum of conversation.

npcs.name: Gnome Resident
npcs.description: A typical gnome inhabitant of Gnomengarde

npcs.name: Middle-aged Gnome Woman
npcs.description: A friendly gnome woman wearing an apron, busy with household tasks.

plotHooks: Learn about gnome society
Find personal items of missing kings
Investigate the kings' last known activities

features.name: Cozy Beds
features.description: Small, comfortable beds with intricate carvings

features.name: Personal Belongings
features.description: Shelves and chests containing gnome possessions

features.name: Dining Table
features.description: A table laden with gnomish delicacies including bread, cheeses, dried fruits, and smoked meats

dcChecks.description: Find clues about the missing kings in their personal quarters

doors.name: Living Quarters to Welcome Chamber Door
doors.description: A wooden door with a small window and a 'Do Not Disturb' sign.

doors.name: Living Quarters to Dining Hall Door
doors.description: A door with a built-in cat flap for easy access.

locations.name: Testing Chamber
locations.description: A reinforced room where new inventions are tested, with scorch marks on the walls and fluctuating magical lighting casting eerie shadows.
plotHooks: Test a new invention
Discover a malfunctioning device causing trouble

traps.name: Unpredictable Energy Discharge
traps.description: Random bursts of magical energy from experiments

features.name: Testing Apparatus
features.description: Various machines and devices for testing inventions

features.name: Scorch Marks
features.description: Evidence of past experimental mishaps on walls and floor

dcChecks.description: Understand the nature of the experiments being conducted
Avoid accidental activation of an unstable device

doors.name: Testing Chamber to Inventor's Workshop Door
doors.description: A heavy metal door with numerous warning signs and a small viewport.

doors.name: Testing Chamber to Vault Door
doors.description: An imposing vault door with multiple locks and magical wards.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: A grand room with long tables neatly set, though bearing signs of recent turmoil, such as displaced chairs and minor wear and tear.

npcs.name: Chef Nibblenock
npcs.description: A gnome chef who was initially cheerful but became somber when recounting the mysterious events surrounding the disappearance of the kings.

plotHooks: Participate in a gnomish feast
Investigate food-related incidents
Discover the truth behind the kings' disappearance

features.name: Automated Serving System
features.description: Intricate network of conveyor belts and mechanical arms serving food

features.name: Feast Tables
features.description: Long tables with built-in heating and cooling compartments

features.name: Faint Glittering Residue
features.description: A faint, glittering residue hinting at some sort of magical influence, found on the floor where the kings were last seen.

dcChecks.description: Resist the effects of an particularly exotic gnomish dish
Discover the secret ingredient in a special gnomish recipe
Identify the nature of the faint, glittering residue on the floor

doors.name: Dining Hall to Living Quarters Door
doors.description: A swinging door with a porthole window, allowing easy access with full hands.

doors.name: Dining Hall to Throne Room Door
doors.description: An ornate double door with food-themed carvings.

locations.name: Vault
locations.description: A secure room filled with completed magical items and valuable materials.
plotHooks: Retrieve a specific item for a quest
Protect the vault from intruders

traps.name: Arcane Lock
traps.description: A powerful magical seal on the vault door

features.name: Enchanted Shelves
features.description: Rows of shelves with individual protective wards

features.name: Magical Containment Units
features.description: Specially designed containers for volatile magical items

dcChecks.description: Identify the nature of the vault's protective enchantments
Carefully remove an item without triggering its individual ward

doors.name: Vault to Testing Chamber Door
doors.description: A massive, reinforced door with multiple magical locks and a complex mechanism.

locations.name: Throne Room
locations.description: An impressively decorated chamber with two ornate chairs for the gnome kings.

npcs.name: Royal Advisor
npcs.description: A wise, elderly gnome responsible for the kingdom's affairs

plotHooks: Audience with gnome leaders
Investigate the disappearance of the kings

features.name: Twin Thrones
features.description: Two intricately carved chairs with magical properties

features.name: Magical Murals
features.description: Animated frescoes depicting the history of Gnomengarde

dcChecks.description: Recall important information about Gnomengarde's past from the murals
Detect subtle clues about the current political situation

doors.name: Throne Room to Dining Hall Door
doors.description: An ornate double door with intricate carvings of gnomish royalty.

doors.name: Throne Room to Secret Exit Door
doors.description: A hidden door behind a tapestry, leading to the secret exit.

locations.name: Secret Exit
locations.description: A narrow tunnel leading out to a hidden exit in Neverwinter Wood.
plotHooks: Discover Gnomengarde's emergency exit
Use as a secret entrance/exit for quests

traps.name: Collapsing Tunnel
traps.description: A section of the tunnel that can be triggered to cave in

features.name: Gnomish Runes
features.description: Magical markings guiding gnomes through the dark passage

features.name: Narrow Ledges
features.description: Treacherous paths requiring careful navigation

dcChecks.description: Notice signs of recent use in the secret tunnel
Navigate the narrow, uneven path without alerting potential pursuers

doors.name: Secret Exit to Throne Room Door
doors.description: A well-hidden door at the entrance of the secret passage.

doors.name: Secret Exit to Neverwinter Wood Edge Door
doors.description: A camouflaged door blending with the natural rock formation.
